user.biography:
Can you imagine waking up to a world without lions? Follow my journey and together let’s make sure that never happens 🦁
@craghoppers

node.text:
Pretty much everybody here knows that I live in the @craghoppers NosiLife Adventure shirt. It might look like an ordinary shirt but it has so many great features that help me every day. A shirt that stands up to the punishment the lions dish out, will definitely stand the test of any adventure! Comment a 👕  emoji if you'd love to try it too!
#mycraghoppers #mindfullymade #craghoppersambassador #craghoppers #nosilifeadventureshirt

node.text:
So I’m often asked why I move the lions in my care around? The answer is simple. Imagine living your entire life in one area, like that of a lion living in a zoo. Lions thrive on having access to new environments, which brings new stimulations, smells and sights. It’s really only because of my relationships that moving is a stress free occurrence which would otherwise need veterinary intervention and anaesthesia. This makes frequent moves in other facilities infrequent. I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again, ‘we should be aiming for less and less lions being kept in captivity and aiming for more and more lions in the wild through habitat protection and preservation.’ When the lions in my care pass on, I will not be replacing them, even with rescues. Instead the lion camps will be used for rehabilitation of wild carnivores and once rehabilitated will be released back into the wild. 

#neighbour #neighbours #kevinrichardson #animalwelfare #betterlife #wildlife #responsibility #lionsofinstagram 
#lions #mycraghoppers #mindfullymade 
@craghoppers

Watch some thought-provoking action in The Truth about 2020. A challenging year made up of reflection, kindness and great changes. We now all have a choice to make... will you join us and act now? 
 
#KevinRichardsonFoundation #ChooseHope #TheLionWhisperer
 
www.choosehope2020.com
 
Learn more about the Foundation at @kevinrichardsonfoundation 
.
.
.
.

node.text: Nyeba had loads of fun out on his walk today. It was extremely hot and humid however he sniffed out this pool of water left from the heavy rains of late and went for a well deserved goof. How can you not love hyena after watching Nyeba fool around in the water! Enjoy the video and the next time you see a hyena in the wild,(hopefully soon 🙏🏼) stop and give it the attention it deserves! #hyena #hyenaofinstagram #spottedhyena #yearofthehyena #hyenawhisperer #lionwhisperertv #kevinrichardson #kevinrichardsonfoundation #kevinrichardsonwildlifesanctuary

node.text: A few weeks back I posted a couple of photos from this scene and many of you asked if I’d taken any video and if I’d post it. Here it is. 6 lions cooperatively feeding on an impala carcass. Listen to the sounds and take them in. It’s not often you get this close to lions eating like this. The canines have served their purpose and now it’s up to the incisors and the carnassial teeth to do their jobs.

node.text:
What comes after the Pandemic? This video message from the virus to humankind is a chilling reminder that our future is intimately connected with all other life on Earth. We know where the pandemic came from and we know how to stop the next one. It's time to make our voices heard. Enough is enough. Now that our own vulnerability has been laid bare, it's time to demand #ExtinctionEndsHere -- for all life on Earth.

TAKE ACTION: ExtinctionEndsHere.org

Video: @SeaLegacy & @global_wildlife_conservation

node.text: My good friend @kimwolhuter posted an excellent video on Instagram TV which I suggest you all watch. The other day we met for coffee and decided 2020 should be the year of the hyena. There are still so many myths and misconceptions surrounding this unique and incredible species. “In the end we will conserve only what we love, we will love only what we understand, and we will understand only what we are taught.” Baba Dioum #yearofthehyena #hyenasarecool #hyenasofinstagram  #protecthyena #hyena #hyaena #spottedhyena

node.text: Recently, I was asked out to dinner by my partners @mercedesbenzsa as they got ready for their 2019 Eat Out Mercedes- Benz Restaurant Awards coming up on November 17th.  @marble_sa chef @davidhiggschef knew just what to serve. What would you serve me if I was coming for dinner?

node.title: A dinner fit for a Lionwhisperer

node.text:
Why do they grow up so fast?! Seems like just yesterday we welcomed these six beautiful cubs into our lives to help teach the world about canned hunting and now they are full-on adults! Join me as I head out with Thor’s pride and learn what makes each of these cats complete individuals. For the full video on #LionwhispererTV click the link above in my Contact in Bio.  Wishing you all a fabulous weekend, take the time to stop and smell the roses, spend time with family and friends, enjoy the weather and take that #digitaldetox. See you all back here on Monday!
.
.
.
.
.
#lions #weekends #weekendvibes #takesometime #smelltheroses #thor #pride #lionprides #africa #southafrica #mothernature

node.text:
To all the lucky members of our #LionwhispererTV channel, all we can say is Ooh Lala! Join me  as I head out with my good friends Cameron Scott @camscott_wild and Roan Du Plessis @theroanlife as they search for the ever-elusive wild white lion. 
Special thanks to Cam and Roan, our videographer Willem van Heerden and @andbeyondngala Private Game Reserve, who are active supporters of the @lionrecovery Fund

If you’re not yet a member, joining is easy! Simply click the link in our Contact in Bio and hit join!

To watch the full movie as a member, please find the link in our Contact in Bio.

*Please take note of the sheer joy on my face!
.
.
.
.
.
#lions #whitelions #safari #ngalaprivategamereserve #wildlife #africa #southafrica #wildandfree #nature #naturelover #reconnectwithnature

node.text:
Did you miss out on Friday's video?? It’s been quite a while since we had a catch-up with George and Yame! You won’t believe how these two guys have grown up, nor how happy Georgie is, even with all his issues. So, come for a walk with me and let’s get reacquainted!  For the full video on #LionwhispererTV, click the link above in my Contact in Bio. Happy Monday all!
.
.
.
.
#Mpmdaymood #georgeandyame #wildlife #lions #spanishrescue #thrive

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Kevin Richardson on July 27, 2021 tagging @kevinrichardsonfoundation. May be a closeup of 1 person, big cat and outdoors.

node.text:
Suja basking in the early morning sun, enjoying the warmth and giving us his steely stare. I still often wonder how animals cope with the cold as we make our way through this last cold front, where we’ve seen many nights with sub zero temperatures. From a modern humans perspective, we battle with the extreme cold and the extreme heat. At least I know I do! Companies spend millions developing stuff that’s meant to keep us toasty or cool. So I often lie at night wondering how the animals at the sanctuary are coping with the extremely cold weather. 
They seem to do just fine with what they have both in summer and winter. Humans on the other hand… well, let’s just say that we’ve gotten a lot softer since we started sporting animal skins and sitting around fires to keep us warm at night. I guess as they say, necessity is the mother of all invention. This certainly holds true for humans. Something more to that? I certainly think so! 

#cold #coldweather #animals #staywarm #coldnights #southafrica #lions #foodforthought #coldfront #ponder #winter #kevinrichardson #kevinrichardsonwildlifesanctuary #thelionwhisperer

node.text:
Put your right foot forward and have a good week everyone! Neige is such a playful lioness always up for a game. In this instance the game was called, ‘see if you can get a cool pic of me before I smash your camera to bits.’ Guess I won this round? Let’s see how the next one turns out. 

#neige❄️ #neige #lioness #games #smash #blackandwhite #blackandwhitephotography #coolcat #happymonday #kevinrichardson #thelionwhisperer #kevinrichardsonwildlifesanctuary #swipe

node.text:
Happy Friday everyone! In today’s video, we’re giving you an update on the 5 baby cheetahs we recently rescued. These updates will be a lot more regular from now on so be sure to stay up to date with all of our uploads!

Show these adorable cubs some love in the YouTube comments - swipe up on my story now to give the video a watch 🐾
